content.raw: I get a compile error here, changing vis to `vis->GetName()` fixes the error
content.html: I get a compile error here, changing vis to vis->GetName() fixes the error

content.raw: oh looks like I was looking at an outdated file
content.html: oh looks like I was looking at an outdated file

content.raw: Sure, we can use weak pointers in the future.
content.html: Sure, we can use weak pointers in the future.

content.raw: The main problem is the shared pointers are keeping the visuals alive? maybe we can start considering passing weak pointers in the future?
content.html: The main problem is the shared pointers are keeping the visuals alive? maybe we can start considering passing weak pointers in the future?

content.raw:
It doesn't have to be addressed in this pull request if you don't want to, but there's also an `std::map<rendering::VisualPtr, msgs::Visual>` and `std::map<rendering::VisualPtr, msgs::Collision>` in ModelData.hh:

* [ModelData.hh:193](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/de92021724985e5632d0ed6d5c7156c5bfd2d1ba/gazebo/gui/model/ModelData.hh?at=issue_1702_part5&fileviewer=file-view-default#ModelData.hh-193)
* [ModelData.hh:202](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/de92021724985e5632d0ed6d5c7156c5bfd2d1ba/gazebo/gui/model/ModelData.hh?at=issue_1702_part5&fileviewer=file-view-default#ModelData.hh-202)
content.html:
It doesn't have to be addressed in this pull request if you don't want to, but there's also an std::map<rendering::VisualPtr, msgs::Visual> and std::map<rendering::VisualPtr, msgs::Collision> in ModelData.hh:

  • ModelData.hh:193
  • ModelData.hh:202

content.raw:
I'm getting a test failure in `UNIT_RenderWidget_TEST`.

~~~
UNIT_RenderWidget_TEST: /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp:653: typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = gazebo::rendering::Scene; typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type = gazebo::rendering::Scene*]: Assertion `px != 0' failed.
...
(gdb) bt
...
#3  0x00007ffff3f30c32 in __GI___assert_fail (assertion=0x7ffff709f2b1 "px != 0", 
    file=0x7ffff709f7b8 "/usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp", line=653, 
    function=0x7ffff70a5820 <_ZZNK5boost10shared_ptrIN6gazebo9rendering5SceneEEptEvE19__PRETTY_FUNCTION__> "typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = gazebo::rendering::Scene; typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type = gazebo::rendering::Sc"...) at assert.c:101
#4  0x00007ffff6f12cf3 in boost::shared_ptr<gazebo::rendering::Scene>::operator-> (this=<optimized out>)
    at /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp:653
#5  0x00007ffff6f14f1a in operator-> (this=0xadcf00) at /usr/include/c++/4.8/bits/stl_vector.h:911
#6  gazebo::gui::GLWidget::SetSelectedVisual (this=this@entry=0xadcec0, _vis=...)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/gazebo/gui/GLWidget.cc:1034
#7  0x00007ffff6f14fde in gazebo::gui::GLWidget::Clear (this=this@entry=0xadcec0)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/gazebo/gui/GLWidget.cc:874
#8  0x00007ffff6f15096 in gazebo::gui::GLWidget::OnRemoveScene (this=0xadcec0, _name=...)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/gazebo/gui/GLWidget.cc:913
#9  0x00007ffff5521579 in operator() (a0=..., this=<optimized out>)
    at /usr/include/boost/function/function_template.hpp:767
#10 gazebo::event::EventT<void (std::string const&)>::Signal<std::string>(std::string const&) (this=
    0x7ffff5829640 <gazebo::rendering::Events::removeScene>, _p=...)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/gazebo/common/Event.hh:377
#11 0x00007ffff551d1dc in operator()<std::basic_string<char> > (_p=..., this=<optimized out>)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/gazebo/common/Event.hh:213
#12 gazebo::rendering::RenderEngine::RemoveScene (

    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/RenderEngine.cc:234
#13 0x00007ffff551d377 in gazebo::rendering::RenderEngine::Fini (
    this=0x7ffff788aec0 <SingletonT<gazebo::rendering::RenderEngine>::GetInstance()::t>)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/RenderEngine.cc:351
#14 0x00007ffff5522fc1 in gazebo::rendering::fini ()
